text: Ich prophet said do them GOD appointed Taloot (Saul) je tvoj king. They said Ako mozem he have kingship us when my bol worthy z kingship than he; he je nie vecer zirny? He said GOD zvolit si him ona zehnat him abundance znalost do zbor GOD grants Jeho kingship whomever He wills! GOD bol Bounteous Omniscient
